n: Caipirinha de Morango com Kiwi (Strawberry Kiwi Cocktail)
des: "Brazil's favorite drink, the caipirinha, is made a little sweeter here with the addition of strawberry and kiwi instead of lime. A refreshingly addictive cocktail!"
ins: Place strawberries, kiwi, and sugar into a glass; mash well with a cocktail muddler. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour in cachaca; stir.
